    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="40715" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="40715" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.91</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="933">933</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="87"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>The Revenge Of Lady Blanche</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>The Revenge Of Lady Blanche</b> was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Hyacinth and Narcissus; middle notes are Iris, Ginger flower and Angelica; base note is Sandalwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about                             <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    Slight sweetness may not be preferred by some
                </div>

                    Sharp and biting thorny opening

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2348599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348599" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suelll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165138"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1165138.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suelll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165138">Suelll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>2 small sprays from a sample to my inner arm, first thought that came to mind is, my my this reminds me of diptyque fleur de peau, not scent wise but because I don’t smell much of anything. Am I also possibly nose blind to Lady Blanche? If I inhale deeply, it smells like a subtler version of Iris ukiyoe. The notes are all right up my alley. Maybe it’s not working right now because it’s cold. I will try again when it’s warmer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2348599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2348599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324515" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); It is accompanied by green and fresh tones. It's a fragrance I buy when I go into a shop to buy flowers. It can be suitable for spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2324515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2324515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312463" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312463" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SophiaViolette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1677133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SophiaViolette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312463ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312463" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677133">SophiaViolette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon the first sprays I get right away a cloud of white, musky florals. Reminded me of some already smelled fragrances from MFK and Van Cleef.<br />
Unfortunately not much develops after, I don’t get any woodiness in here, nor spicy green notes, and I did try it a couple of times and different days.<br />
Overall light, clean, makes me think of fresh expensive laundry, but nothing groundbreaking nor enough to justify the price tag.<br />
<br />
___<br />
<br />
Projection, sillage, longevity : 7/10<br />
Originality, presentation : 5,5/10<br />
Quality, value : 7/10<br />
<br />
6,5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2312463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2312463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very clean and generic scent. I didn’t get green from this. I got a very clean linens smell. Weak sillage and longevity. Wouldn’t purchase a full bottle unless I’m into really clean scents, which I’m not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2281291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2281291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like a flowery female shampoo<br />
Not the biggest fan<br />
But it is clean and fresh floral that doesn't give me a headache</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2275990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2275990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2265682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265682" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mv88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1193723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mv88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193723">mv88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The super green hyacinth and the carrot-y iris are what stand out for me.  This is definitely a very green scent and kind of unique while at the same time familiar.<br />
It's simple and uncomplicated.<br />
A springy daytime garden scent that comes on strong but balances out pretty quickly.<br />
<br />
...really liking the carrot...🥕 🧡💚<br />
<br />
UPDATE:<br />
I'm still new to iris scents, but with this one, for the first time, i see how/why they are often implicated in lipstick or makeup type fragrances.  I've been looking for a purely lipstick scent, and while this may not be it, i do think fans of that category would enjoy this herbaceous spin on it.  It's very fresh and green and lively -- and then just beneath that is a lovely and elegant makeup powder or vintage lipstick note -- i think that's the iris, which is the carrot, which more experience finally reveals is at the heart of the sweetness and powderiness that bring up the smell of <br />
makeup.<br />
<br />
If you're a collector of makeup or lipstick scents but are looking for a fresh take on them (this literally smells quite fresh) to add more variety to your collection, this could be a wonderful addition.<br />
<br />
The word "classy" keeps coming up for me with this one.  I think of Victoria Beckham dressed to attend a friend's spring wedding or some such fancy, yet outdoorsy, event!  Proper dress attire, but with sunglasses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2265682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2265682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258253" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deja1sabel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="deja1sabel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Curatrix/Antihero-99118.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99118.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Antihero"title="Antihero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874562">deja1sabel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very green floral with a sort of metallic musk to it. This is dry, powdery, and vintage with a soft woody touch. There’s a bit of an underlying alluring smokiness here too that’s hard to pinpoint. It has that locked away in an attic and forgotten about hazy nostalgic charm to it, it’s almost witchy, old ladyish but in a good way. I don’t think I love the scent but it’s a weird one I found myself going back to smell over and over again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2258253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2258253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Revenge of Lady Blanche is a lovely green floral featuring some of my favourite notes. Hyacinth is an underrated note that brings me back to springtime during my childhood, while iris is perhaps my favourite note of all. Here, they meld together beautifully, making for a high-quality springtime scent in the manner of Chanel No. 19.<br />
<br />
RLB opens with powdery, green-tinged iris, floral and delicate. The hyacinth follows, bold and heady, even slightly waxy, but also very green and sap-like. The pollen-y narcissus emerges after a little while, very realistic and slightly hay-like, rounding out the florals to perfection. It fades fairly quickly, becoming a soft, powdery skin scent. Sillage and longevity are moderate. It is a feminine springtime scent for everyday use.<br />
<br />
A simple, beautiful springtime bouquet, RLB is my favourite from Penhaligon's so far. It is a little sheer and subtle for my liking - I would have liked a mossy chypre base to ground it - but ultimately, this is a top-notch green floral freshie. 4/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2248869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2248869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My only worry is in full bottle it would possibly take a long time to ripen to the same depth, as often I have noticed full.bottles aren't as nice yet, and thr samples have had exposure to air and aging so like fine wine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2153380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2153380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140946" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lauanevan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1040586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1040586.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lauanevan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/Complicated-Shadows-70957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Complicated Shadows"title="Complicated Shadows"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1040586">lauanevan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has a very similar natural green note combined with florals as Santa Maria Novella L'iris. Lady Blanche is with a mixed boquet of flowers while L'iris is only iris. Both are very lovely, natural and organic smelling. Personally I just prefer L'iris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2140946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2140946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108279" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chloejade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chloejade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Irresistible-Givenchy-60891.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60891.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Irresistible Givenchy"title="Irresistible Givenchy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859713">chloejade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-29">03/29/24 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like old-timey florals! It opens with a pretty harsh green note, and the harshness fades a little but not completely throughout the fragrance; it becomes a little more powdery, but that greenness stays the whole lifespan of the fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2108279"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2108279#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 14:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very big floral notes. I get very little of anything that's not flowers. Very feminine and reminds me of old school women's fragrances. It's not bad but you must be a fan of floral scents . 100% not unisex. <br />
Right at the beginning you get a ton of iris and what smells more like rose to me. It pretty much keeps that going until it fades away . Once it dries down you do get some powder , maybe a touch of flower stem . Since I got this in a discovery set I was not going to let this go to waste lol. I started layering it with Montblanc Legend. It REALLY tones down the Montblanc and makes it softer.  But layered they make a very bold scent that would work very well for something formal . <br />
But the fragrance it self. It is on the old school side, very floral, strong at first but mellows out very quick ( maybe 10 minutes). After about 90 mins it settles into a floral powder.  Performance is ok, 3 sprays you get a flower blast to the face. Tones down after about 10 to 15 minutes. Stays very floral for about another 30 to 45 minutes. Then it gets to that powdery state. It does smell nice and you can tell it's high quality . Very linear so it's easy to layer . For my taste it's just ok . And yes it's very expensive. Not worth the price in my opinion<br />
Scent - 7.0<br />
Complexity - 6.5<br />
Quality- 10.0<br />
Performance - 8.0<br />
Bottle -10.0</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2105049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2105049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099799" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emmabrenneman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410739"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1410739.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emmabrenneman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410739">emmabrenneman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful IRIS scent but I don't detect any hyacinth, like I was hoping for distinct hyacinth as in Demeter's hyacinth. Definitely lovely but man, I'm needing more green, deep, dark, wet hyacinth. If you ever smell a hyacinth they are STRONG and distinct. This smell is lighter and sparklier, like iris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2099799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2099799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071621" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellysmellz83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2012408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellysmellz83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2012408">smellysmellz83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is beauty in simplicity. For the first hour, when I close my eyes and inhale, I can smell honeysuckle, and maybe orchids? Orris is the note is listed on the Penhaligon's website. The florals feel photorealistic, as though I'm in a riotous flower garden. There is also the "powdery" or "soap suds" note/feel, which I've picked up on in the other Penhaligon scents (Empressa and Luna). For me, these notes often burn my nose or make it feel like my nostrils are drying out. Here, though, I didn't find it overwhelming or unpleasant. The website also lists a sandalwood base, and I think this reveals itself after an hour or so. After two hours, the florals fade away, and there is just a gentle sandalwood/musk left behind. Hour three onward is a "skin scent", an occasional gentle whiff of a molecule (iso-e super?) with only a hint of florals remaining. <br />
<br />
This is my dream flower scent. I wish it were longer lasting, though at the same time, the softness means that I would feel confident wearing this EDT anywhere, from a job interview to a date. I don't pick up any sugar, fruit, or spiced notes, which means that this one is probably never going to be a favorite for the teens–20s crowd (as opposed to Flowerbomb, for example). For me, though, I'm glad those notes aren't in this scent. 10/10 for its elegance and simplicity. 7/10 for its longevity, knowing that it's an EDT.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2071621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2071621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066514" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066514" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xvxmatthewxvx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1028003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xvxmatthewxvx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Five-O-Clock-Au-Gingembre-2764.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2764.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"title="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066514ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066514" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003">xvxmatthewxvx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Right off the bat I get iris, mint, &amp; fig leaves. It’s giving me Bois d’Ambrette vibes by Atelier Materi. I probably put on 5-6 sprays and it’s nuclear projecting into my sinuses. Cool, aquatic, soily, &amp; ripe dark fruit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2066514"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2066514#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994889">denizzlovess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 20:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it starts very green and after a short moment the flowers come through. it's still a very fresh, slightly floraly fragrance that's safe for summer daytime. it kinda reminds me of a British lady having tea time in her floral wall paper living room.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2059544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2059544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049712" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049712" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rebecca&#039;s daughter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160957"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1160957.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rebecca&#039;s daughter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gres/Cabochard-1060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cabochard"title="Cabochard"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049712ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049712" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160957">Rebecca&#039;s daughter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 04:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first five minutes are to die for: a perfect iris wrapped in greens. It reminded of Mugler Cologne, of Herbes Troublantes. But that phase didn't last long. <br />
Then I was transported back to the last weeks of pregnancy: a strictly saltless diet. The Lady Blanche could do with a pinch of salt to give her a little oomph - to alleviate the blandness, the paleness. After an hour I was fed up, and covered her in a dousing of 24 Faubourg. That shut her up completely, so I have no idea about the staying power. <br />
I never expected to get bored with a soft iris scent, but this pulled it off ...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2049712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2049712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027523" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027523" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babypong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1869030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="babypong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-62-56062.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56062.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '62"title="Cheirosa '62"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027523ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027523" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869030">babypong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 05:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to agree with some of the AI generated cons with this one. Its a heavily green scent with a powdery vibe. I see flowers listed as notes but I would not describe it as a floral. There is no base so it lacks depth. Lasts only around 3 hours before I need to reapply. Has light silage. Generally it smells like a unisex deodorant for me. I am not a fan of this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2027523"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2027523#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006193" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 10:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first impression of Lady Blanche was sub-par.<br />
Hit with a thick, sharp wall of a harsh, spicy, muskiness that was quite 'old-lady-esk'<br />
<br />
Luckily she cooled off pretty quickly after we spent a few moments together.<br />
After the initial hit of sharp tangled notes subsides, the florals become very central. <br />
<br />
A honeysuckle/waterlily/violet/iris bouquet with their freshly cut stems adding a nice green dash.<br />
<br />
Underneath is a clean, straightforward, soapy floral that keeps an 'antique' vibe going.<br />
This base is the most prominent element after some time.<br />
<br />
There's a dampness in the greenery and a dryness in the base, contradictory, but it works.<br />
<br />
Pretty minimal lasting power and projection sadly.<br />
<br />
VERDICT:<br />
Don't judge too harshly based on first-impressions, Lady Blanche is much kinder given some time to warm up. <br />
<br />
IMO she sits firmly in the 'older lady' category, however she will suit some very well. <br />
Missing an interesting edge for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2006193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2006193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2003867" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colorfulmess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047543"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1047543.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="colorfulmess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Christos-81631.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81631.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Christos"title="Christos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2003867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2003867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047543">colorfulmess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-17">12/17/23 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Watery green lilies without any grounding notes. If you like this, go for Oscar de La Renta, Something Blue and Elizabeth Arden, 5th Avenue, which are basically the same, but far cheaper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2003867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2003867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nikkidlima"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1830550.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nikkidlima" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40715.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Revenge Of Lady Blanche"title="The Revenge Of Lady Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830550">Nikkidlima</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 02:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell in love with this scent since I picked up a tester set from the mall six months ago. I loved it so much but the price stopped me but I finally gave in and bought a bottle yesterday and I have no regrets. It’s a beautiful,feminine fragrance. I feel I have been transported to a fried full of flowers. This scent makes me so happy. The only downside of it is that I have to reapply it after four to five hours which I don’t mind but some people may find that a bit tedious</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Not my parfume and not my cup of tea for sure. I found it basic and uninteresting. I finally found how to enjoy this on me - hair. Generous, but diffused sprays. While I loved the idea of LB before, during, and after buying, the reality on my skin always turned into a juxtaposition of the childhood memory of Climat and a wet, cold, watery swamp of a sad hyacinth. However on hair it is splendidly elegant and slightly broken - exactly how I would describe the wake of a good revenge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1896621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1896621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very classy indeed. Not for everyone for sure.<br />
If it was stronger would be super revenge for the office.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1872592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1872592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872583" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frangipanilove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.528960.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frangipanilove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Aqua-Vitae-Forte-31404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Vitae Forte"title="Aqua Vitae Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872583ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872583" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); I find it a little odd, with an almost medicinal edge. Like some really odd old fashioned floral candy from the past - smells and flavours that should not be together for a reason. I am sure there is someone out there who likes this. They probably have a lavender coloured hair.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1872583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1872583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; mixed flowers. A lot of powdery iris. Not very interesting otherwise. Somewhat of an old lady scent. Has a lot of character.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1869413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1869413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484">Mdk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-01">07/01/23 22:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An elegant and powdery bouquet.<br />
It has a clean scent reminiscent of lilies and hyacinths.<br />
I feel that the scent of tea is also hidden slightly.<br />
Classic and classy, this is my preferred strain. However, I wanted to feel the poison of this scent, "a lady planning to poison her husband."<br />
Regardless of the story, Blanche from Fragrance is simply a neat and elegant woman.<br />
And this scent is probably the kind of thing you can find better at a better price if you look around for vintage perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1869234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1869234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; That is my only complaint about Lady Blanche, as she is quite lovely, if you adore the natural smell of the Iris and Hyacinth flowers, as I do. The scent is like an early spring bouquet. It starts sharply, but immediately settles down nicely, and as it waves farewell I’m left with a soft powdery daffodil. This is a perfume I might consider full bottle worthy, for no other reason then to smell my favorite flowers. from my favorite time of year, at any time and as a boost during the winter blues.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dropped my glass sample of this and broke it. I was not disappointed. <br />
<br />
Coming from someone who likes smoky, vanilla gourmand scents... this is definitely not it for me which is what I'd expect me to say. But if you enjoy soapy, floral scents with a touch of woods this could be for you. Elegant and mature, which seems run-of-the-mill for Penhaligon's. I will not be purchasing any iteration of this, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1856790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1856790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
