Probably an acquired taste for most. There is no sweetness at the beginning but it develops into a floral sweetness on the drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1793056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1793056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790336" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-22">03/22/23 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to say this scent has personalityyyyyy. She is matured Joe from Little Women. Has quality and presence in her stature but isn't afraid to take the lead in being quirky and spontaneous. She's definitely hard to say "no" to. Her scent feels quite second skin like, and a tad powdery, but I love that sharpness and somewhat mysterious nature from the Iris. The sillage I find is weak but longevity is there.<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
⬆️Gemini ☀️Aries 🌜Sagittarius</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1790336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1790336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1778845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1778845" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mother Nurgle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1177401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mother Nurgle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Harvest-Mouse-78580.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78580.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Harvest Mouse"title="Harvest Mouse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1778845ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1778845" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177401">Mother Nurgle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-09">03/09/23 00:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An hour after application and I can barely smell it. Defintely a skin scent. It smells good, though. Great even! But I get no hyacinth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1778845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1778845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1761487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1761487" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rcates78"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1343852.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rcates78" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tommy-Hilfiger/Tommy-Girl-3016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tommy Girl"title="Tommy Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1761487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1761487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343852">Rcates78</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-16">02/16/23 08:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lady Blanche opens rather woody and green and brings to mind upscale outdoor flea markets, flush with expertly restored antique wooden furniture and fresh flower stands that dot the blacktop.  Not too long after, the florals take more of the lead and I'm finding the compilation much akin to Burberry Her.  It isn't a beast by any stretch, is nice but not original, and I needed a respray midday, bc longevity is more like an eau de toilet.  I will use my sample but I don't find it FBW.  She really doesn't stand out in the crowd.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1761487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1761487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1743178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1743178" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natfran98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="natfran98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1743178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1743178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230919">natfran98</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-25">01/25/23 11:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dry-down much nicer than the opening, which is just too reminiscent of vintage soap for my taste. But the longevity is pretty awful. Not the only one in the Portraits collection with this issue.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1743178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1743178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1740446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1740446" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Evenlesscreative"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659091"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Evenlesscreative" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lake-Skye/Saffron-Dusk-76973.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76973.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Saffron Dusk"title="Saffron Dusk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1740446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1740446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659091">Evenlesscreative</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-22">01/22/23 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sharp green and strong hyacinth. I don't smell the powder many mention, but honestly it does seem to dissipate VERY quickly. I just sprayed like 20 minutes ago and can barely smell it now. As far as florals go it's fine, but I like spicier scents. So far I much prefer most of the 'masculine' scents from this line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1740446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1740446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1693844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1693844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scents4spirit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1606556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scents4spirit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Radical-Rose-66043.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66043.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Radical Rose"title="Radical Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1693844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1693844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606556">Scents4spirit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-22">11/22/22 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mom gave me a bottle of this and had it sitting in my closet for a while without using it because I wasn’t a huge fan of the super soapy and sharp narcissus smell. I forgot about it until one day it occurred to me that I can layer it with another scent, because I felt like it was missing something. I figured citrus would be the perfect top note pairing with this, and I was right! Now on top of it I spray Sun by Lush and it brightens up the scent and brings it to a whole new life! Absolutely love it, energizing and uplifting. Only issue is both perfumes are not long lasting at allllll, several minutes later they’re hard to detect, I’m gonna use them for an energizing scent boost since I have them but definitely will not repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1693844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1693844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="banjerine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="banjerine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Followed-75977.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75977.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Followed"title="Followed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406242">banjerine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-05">10/05/22 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A grown-up, vaguely sinister green floral—astringent, absinthian, deadly serious. I can imagine this scent emanating from some ageless, elegant woman as she quietly conquers the entire catalogue at an antiques auction; someone who carries an air of the otherworldly, like she may or may not be a distant descendant of faeries.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1659467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1659467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658191" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ViciousVirgo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220737"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ViciousVirgo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Paris-94.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paris"title="Paris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220737">ViciousVirgo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-03">10/03/22 13:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sometimes I feel like I can barely smell it at all… but then I can? like the closer / more I try to smell it, it disappears. But then if I just wildly wave my wrist around/near my face… there it is again. It’s very slippery &amp; elusive. <br />
<br />
I love Penhaligon’s; beautiful pkging, iconic, historical etc. - sampled a ton , just wish I could afford all the ones on my list lol - their prices can get ridiculous &amp; not sure the frags are groundbreaking - but great quality, approachable &amp; beautiful none the less - like Blanche is similar to other frags but it doesn’t make Blanche any less stunning.<br />
<br />
Its similar to Dolceaqua by Masque Milano - DA is slightly more defined, potent, long lasting, a bit more soft, soapy, fresh powdery etc. I can pinpoint *exactly* where I sprayed it lol def not as evasive as Blanche. But Blanche is still beautiful - they both are!<br />
<br />
Def similarities between them but if you’re obsessed with powdery florals as much as I am and can find them both for a good price? yes own both!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1658191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1658191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651676" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-23">09/23/22 23:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sprayed on card from a Discovery set. It's a nice scent that I would consider buying as a gift for a lady friend. Initially on card it had a slight Byredo Bal d'Afrique vibe in the opening but it seems to be diverging in the drydown. The opening was the closest to unisex, then it settles more decidedly feminine. Although I bought a full bottle of Bal d'Afrique because it had a strong unisex character, Lady Blanche is too feminine for me so I'll use the 2ml sample decant for testing on lady friends.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1651676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1651676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But...White flowers. Smells like a grandma perfume. For me it's a boring and annoying scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1631019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1631019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1601336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A very nice floral fragrance for spring. Elegant, inoffensive, a little vintage vibe. good quality of ingredient, linear to my nose. Hyacinth is the star, iris is present. <br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1565815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1565815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1539473" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1539473" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wednesdaychild41"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wednesdaychild41" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Papillon-Artisan-Perfumes/Epona-95954.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95954.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Epona"title="Epona"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1539473ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1539473" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239">Wednesdaychild41</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-08">04/08/22 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impressions. . <br />
<br />
A woody Bluebell soap. <br />
<br />
Safe, classy and very simple. But pleasant and clean for spring. <br />
<br />
Once discovering the notes, i wasn't surprised by the hyacinth as that's often used to create Bluebell accords. But glad the hyacinth doesn't have its slightly dirty indolic side here. Very calm and smooth. I really like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1539473"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1539473#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1520153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1520153" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="puremugetto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="puremugetto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78574.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valaya"title="Valaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1520153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1520153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305935">puremugetto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-10">03/10/22 02:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I collect every perfume that has resemblence with my beloved Prada Infusion d'iris. <br />
There is Chanel no:19 poudre as usual.<br />
There is this niche cousin YSL Trench<br />
and now the little darling Penhaligon.<br />
<br />
All these four perfumes have their iris freshly cut. <br />
I became obsessed with iris after Prada and began searching for iris based perfumes. Mostly i found myself displeased with them as iris is generally combined with carroty, sticky undertones.  a make up cake, like the make up bag smell of an old lady.<br />
These irises that i am disapointed with are; FM iris poudre, hermes hiris, guerlain L’Heure Bleue and some other famous that i don't remember.<br />
There is this sharp decisive factor with iris. You are either in one team or another.<br />
<br />
Penhaligon is Prada İris with a beautiful soapy start which comes from narcisus i think.<br />
If you like those iris perfumes i mentioned you will like Penhaligon.<br />
Note down this if ever one of them discontinue.<br />
Unfortunately i have not found a cheaper alternative yet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1520153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1520153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512526" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daisy_D"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daisy_D" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); Elegant, quite soapy.. Could be alright for all seasons, yet people really have to apply very little of it during warmer seasons</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1512526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1512526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1511009" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="*loves_shoes*"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="*loves_shoes*" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1511009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1511009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258">*loves_shoes*</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-24">02/24/22 05:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nice, a green, floral narcotic, as Penhaligons say. <br />
It’s so nice to have an iris perfume that isn’t a powder bomb.<br />
Fresh and a kind of crisp iris, ever so slightly heady, but not cloying as it’s ‘green’.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1511009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1511009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509233" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfume_obsessed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfume_obsessed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294610">perfume_obsessed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 14:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The iris-narcissus combo is magic!  I’ve been thinking of ordering Le Labo’s Iris, but this one is so much better.  It’s an anytime iris perfume that never fails to satisfy.  EdPFM’s Iris Poudre has been my ultimate iris fragrance for quite some time, but now it’s a dead heat between that one and this one.  Stunning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1509233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1509233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1455361" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1455361ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1455361" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-01">12/01/21 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not your typical hyacynth (lacks the rotten undertone) - very green, very refreshing. Feminine, but not in the sense of being gentle, more like a perfume for strong-willed ladies before an important meeting. In this, I find it quite resounding with its backstory...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1455361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1455361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1438960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
