padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/441736">JoeMacchiato</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-07">09/07/19 06:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Save your hard earned money and get a bottle of No.19. Plus, No.19 is a way better fragrance that delivers a sharp, green (cosmetics) iris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1095300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1095300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1056336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1056336" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pimentosugars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5931.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pimentosugars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1056336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1056336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5931">pimentosugars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-02">05/02/19 04:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Revenge is sweet, and so is Lady Blanche.  Starts out cold and rather boozy (poor Blanche!) but the topnotes hide an alluring secret; if you bypass Lady Blanche you will never understand her simple floral harmony, so elegant, so effortless, so fresh and soft without cloying. Less jaguar more pussycat, all purrrfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1056336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1056336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1012300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1012300" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="damienthoresson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1016817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="damienthoresson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1012300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1012300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016817">damienthoresson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-22">12/22/18 00:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One does get a mild N°19 impression from this. It's not unwelcome, but it also doesn't separate itself for the $150 less fragrance to justify the cost. Its gorgeous and lasts a bit longer, but that's it. Perhaps reasonable if you don't have the Chanel and wanted something that lasted longer than 5 hours.<br />
<br />
Not identical, mind you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1012300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1012300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1011790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1011790" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samamtha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/905118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.905118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samamtha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-and-James/Nirvana-Bourbon-40269.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40269.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nirvana Bourbon"title="Nirvana Bourbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1011790ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1011790" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/905118">Samamtha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-20">12/20/18 09:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My experience is similar to that of Fatima D! I got a sample of Lady Blanche out of curiosity simply because I love her daughter (in Penhaligon's Portrait series) Duchess Rose so much lol. I initially thought Lady B was "perfectly wearable", that's it. Tried it a couple of times, started liking it, but kept thinking "it's really lovely, but not me". Now I've used it for 4-5 times, she's getting under my skin! I LOVE Lady Blanche now; I might have to get the bottle. I see a Lady with impeccable manners who's perfectly composed, elegant, matronly, dignified, and discerning. She is parsimonious with her emotional reactions and dreadfully classy... That's Lady Blanche to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1011790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1011790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent991323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc991323" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elisabeth M."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17257"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.17257.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elisabeth M." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Absolue-Oud-Bouquet-94917.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94917.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolue Oud Bouquet"title="Absolue Oud Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma991323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd991323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17257">Elisabeth M.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-14">10/14/18 22:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful retro-driven scent!  Hyacinth and Narcissus, so popular in the 60's and 70's, are quite "dated" ingredients in todays mainstream perfumery. So much better that Penhaligon's remembers its traditions and dares to create such an extravagant beauty that won't please everyone and doesn't want to. Diversity in perfumery should survive this over sugared mainstream taste of today.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="991323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=991323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent953125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc953125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FatimaD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FatimaD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/The-Library-Collection-Opus-X-35679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Library Collection Opus X"title="The Library Collection Opus X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma953125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd953125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129872">FatimaD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-16">06/16/18 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried it once - didn’t like it <br />
Tried second time- didn’t like <br />
On the third try I fell in love. It’s so beautiful. It does have a spicy punch in the dry down. It really is narcotic, like someone said already. It’s feminine, but I can see a man wearing it too. <br />
I have several Penhaligon fragrances, and most of them are from portraits - tho one is on top of my P’s choice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="953125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=953125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939611" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anthonytaykk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="anthonytaykk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/J-adore-210.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.210.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="J'adore"title="J'adore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125622">anthonytaykk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-05">05/05/18 03:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Revenge is an enticing, cold scent- a lightly sweet veneer masking a calculative, penetrating quality. It is one of the few creatively named perfumes that truly lives up to its name. I feel wicked wearing this as a male- and it's a delicious, empowering wickedness. Perhaps the narcotic Narcissus has drugged me, but I am a willing victim-no, a vessel, for this vengeful spirit of a perfume. With the exception of Nasomatto's Narcotic Venus, no other perfume has drugged me so. As with all scents, try it on your skin. The beauty is in getting the narcotic note, and being drugged. If you don't get that note on your skin, don't bother. Otherwise, by all means, arm yourself with the greatest scented poison-dipped dagger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="939611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=939611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume Beginners"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume Beginners" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ta-if-4922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ta'if"title="Ta'if"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780">Perfume Beginners</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-04">05/04/18 17:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Revenge of Lady Blanche is a well-blended fresh and warm scent. It is a rare composition and even rarer a good one among its counterparts. Mugler aura is also a blend of freshness and warmness but it is not as well-blended as this one though it is still a good perfume. Its freshness and warmness are kind of separate. What I mean is that you smell the freshness in one sniff and the warmness in another. However this one is not. The freshness and warmness come to your nose at the same time. I don't know how they do this but indeed it is a succeed.<br />
<br />
It is a confident, ambitious beautiful woman who has her own career and life. She is not a dependent of men. The freshness is her in daytime, acting as a protective shield covering all her secrets and ambition underneath. On the other hand, the warmness resembles her dangerously beauty and deadly lust for money and power which are unknown to anyone. But this is exactly what makes her tempting and beguiling.<br />
<br />
On the test paper, it is sometimes fresh and sometimes warm after dry down. I know it seems weird but that is what I got from the fragrance. Nonetheless, on my skin it is much warmer than fresher that the freshness almost disappear or covered by the warmness and I could only smell a hint of freshness although it still smelled good and blended well with my own chemical. I have to say it smells much much better on skin that on test paper so you have to try it on skin to see its amazing performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="939507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=939507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent874339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc874339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Truffles_L"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Truffles_L" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Fiore-d-Ulivo-6311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiore d'Ulivo"title="Fiore d'Ulivo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma874339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd874339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995517">Truffles_L</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-26">10/26/17 04:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely, grown-up chypre, with green floral and orris notes. It opens brightly and stays fairly linear with a medium sillage. It lasts about 7 hours on my skin before become too much of a skin scent.<br />
<br />
I wear this one to work. It is perfect in the summer or the autumn for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="874339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=874339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent828931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc828931" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mohsen95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mohsen95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma828931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd828931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817">mohsen95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-04">06/04/17 02:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="828931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=828931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent827055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc827055" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gigi The Fashionista"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/951288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.951288.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gigi The Fashionista" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragonard/Violette-14299.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14299.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Violette"title="Violette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma827055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd827055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/951288">Gigi The Fashionista</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-29">05/29/17 03:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fragrance Review For The Revenge Of Lady Blanche <br />
<br />
Penhaligon's<br />
<br />
Notes<br />
<br />
Hyacinth<br />
<br />
Narcissus <br />
<br />
Iris <br />
<br />
Edwardian Revenge Drama<br />
<br />
1910<br />
<br />
Lady Blanche is the last person you'd imagine to be capable of extracting revenge on anyone. She has what appears to be the happiest most perfect life! And not only that she is not called Lady Blanche for nothing. She is British-Welsh, petite, happily married, the mother of a girl and a boy, blonde, with blue eyes, and she has the sweetness of youth. She is only in her mid-20's. She wears a lot of white dresses, hats, gloves, and takes 4 o clock afternoon tea with ladies that are older and have a good influence on her. She is high society and gives much of time and money to causes and charity. But somewhere along the way she was wronged. She has a bitter rivalry with a dark-haired older woman from the same neighborhood, a hypocritical and very malicious high society matron who has done everything she could do to break up her marriage, slander her, attempted to destroy her and has nearly succeeded but this shrinking violet girl has finally blossomed into a mature rose- WITH THORNS! Reminds me of a dramatic soap opera from the 1900 to 1912 period, something like Downtown Abbey. In the end, Lady Blanche has the last laugh and indeed gets her revenge but she has been so discreet about it that no one even noticed. Her nemesis is defeated and in fact, it is she who has been destroyed and has to leave England altogether. <br />
<br />
Revenge opens with whispery white flowers, with a distinctive narcissus as a  trumpet flower as if it is announcing the arrival of a grand lady. The narcissus in the top I found rather soapy but it is clean and refreshing. The white floral scent turns into a fresh English dewy hyacinth. The hyacinth gives this fragrance that Anglo character from Penhaligon. It is as floral as many of the other fragrances from the line but it's far more linear and simple, almost a solifore of iris. The iris takes over in the dry down turning the whole thing into a dusting powder. Fortunately for me the iris blends well with my skin and I welcome dusty powdery fragrances. <br />
<br />
This perfume is elegant, conservative, lady like and mature and she matches up with suits! Not dresses but blouse with a blazer jacket over it and a skirt. This is business formal day wear stuff. Because it is strictly floral, it is perfect for spring and summer. Feminine and nothing unisex about it. I wish there had been additional notes, at least a few more, which would have given this fragrance a stronger base other than orris. Some musk and incense or sandalwood, patchouli, would have been nice. It has a touch of something green which I can't quite make out perhaps it's a dash of vetiver, and it only appears in the middle of the performance which seems to be part of a green-floral stage following the hyacinth. Smells like a garden or rather someone running from a garden and then hastily into a boudoir. She is a well-behaved fragrance but she does have a haughty air, like a young lady with all the money in the world, a title, position, and while not influential herself, she is either married to someone with a lot of power and influence or is the daughter of such a man. This is a clean fresh floral day time perfume for the likes of (no offense just dropping names) Kate Middleton, or her sister Pipa who was recently married. This is also evocative of a woman who while she may not come from money has married into money but has had to fight to maintain a good reputation. Sort of like Krystel Carrington from Dynasty. She has triumphed over Alexis Colby and can breathe a sigh of relief. The mansion that she has made into her nest with Blake can never be taken away from her. <br />
<br />
A beautiful somewhat theatrical fragrance for a woman who is confident, mature, smart, independent and who can appreciate English fragrances like this one. This is not one of the better Penhaligon frags and it's as tame and powdery is Iris Prima but it has more white flower essence in it which I really like. I have received many compliments on it. You can pick this up at the Penhaligon perfume store in London or order it online. Worth the price though it is quite simple and soapy-powdery, subtle, without the real bite I wish it could have had in order to properly feel like I have had my revenge!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="827055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=827055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent819412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc819412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kingdom-Scotland/Metamorphic-53987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Metamorphic"title="Metamorphic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma819412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd819412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-04">05/04/17 08:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't find this similar to Chanel 19, other than the fact there's a distinct iris. It's cleaner and less complex than that, less earthy (no moss, leather or galbanum)it also has a slight sweetness, like Iris Prima but far more crisp, less sweet, powdery and soft.<br />
<br />
The hyacinth stands out for me - it's a very spring-like perfume, the narcissus isn't animalic or rich (as it is in Lumiere Noire for example). It's elegant, cool and I think more contemporary than vintage in style.<br />
<br />
The green-ness is quite naturalistic, very much like the scent of bluebells, not too 'bathroom soap' though since the iris adds its perfumy dry powderiness. <br />
<br />
I like it, I'd say the mood is slightly formal and definitely daytime in spring, similar to comments below I don't find it very vengeful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="819412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=819412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent819371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc819371" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gtabasso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.132621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gtabasso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/True-Lust-Rayon-Violet-De-Ses-Yeux-29397.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29397.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="True Lust Rayon Violet De Ses Yeux"title="True Lust Rayon Violet De Ses Yeux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma819371ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd819371" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132621">gtabasso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-04">05/04/17 04:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very green floral; would swear it has some fig, fig leaf and violet leaf in it; it is mainly this green fig scent with a hint of floral with some sharpness (the way fig sometimes gets you in the throat) and depth with a little spiciness; this is one of the strongest of portraits next to Radcliff; it doesn't have that powdery rub your nose in your arm skin scent quality</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="819371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=819371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent781197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc781197" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ditta70"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/588982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.588982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ditta70" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma781197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd781197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/588982">Ditta70</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-01-14">01/14/17 00:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the blurb on the package of the sample I expected DRAAAAMAAAAA...but this is simply a pleasant little green floral number. Lady Blanche for my nose is a rosy cheeked, airheaded girl, pretty, albeit without much substance, and most definitely incapable of revenge in any shape or form. Not because she is innocent (which she may be), but because that would require intellect, and that she sorely lacks. <br />
<br />
The perfume smells extremely soapy on my skin, like old fashioned hyacinth soap. Not bad really, but nothing to write home about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="781197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=781197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent777069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc777069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ivanqa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/245993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.245993.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ivanqa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Profumum-Roma/Sorriso-21853.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21853.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sorriso"title="Sorriso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma777069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd777069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/245993">Ivanqa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-01-03">01/03/17 09:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, the opening is so fun! Narcissus and Iris as you've never experienced them before. I felt like Alice in Wonderland in a surreal meadow of flowers and plants that make you feel more and more curious and constantly surprised by the complexity of their scent. <br />
Well guys I must test it again to be able to explain myself better than saying it's dreamy. At least the opening. Please be patient.<br />
The only thing is that the dry down was a bit linear and also "unrevengeful", unlike promised. It reminded me of other less interesting scents of this category. Still.. it is worth the try. You'll love the initial cocktail of wonder.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="777069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=777069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent765638" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc765638" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StellaDiverFlynn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/475352"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.475352.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="StellaDiverFlynn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dame-Perfumery/Chocolate-Perfume-Oil-43159.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43159.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chocolate Perfume Oil"title="Chocolate Perfume Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma765638ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd765638" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/475352">StellaDiverFlynn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-29">11/29/16 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first hour of The Revenge of Lady Blanche is promising: bitter green sap of hyacinth with a subtle powdery texture, almost like those in vintage green floral fragrances but not quite as harshly soapy; velvety petals of lily-of-the-valley scattered within, while the golden hay nuance of narcissus lies underneath. The whole effect is like a modern ballad of spring blossoms, lively yet polished as well.<br />
<br />
These spring blossoms becomes gently honeyed roughly 2 hours in, before merging together into an iris/laundry white musk in the next 9 hours of long dry down. The laundry-like white musk doesn't smell aggressively sharp, thankfully. Instead, it's rather smooth and fluffy, which reminds me of the diaphanous LM Parfums Chemise Blanche. There's occasionally some metallic/citrus-y aldehyde dancing around the edges, which also makes me think of Byredo Blanche, although Lady Blanche is much less muddy and more translucent.<br />
<br />
In its final hours, the white musk becomes slightly creamier, warmer and sweeter, as rose and a tonka-like golden powdery note become more noticeable. The sillage is relatively close in general, and the longevity is around 11 hours.<br />
<br />
I enjoyed the opening phase of The Revenge of Lady Blanche a lot, since hyacinth and narcissus are among my favourite floral notes. Moreover, the bitter sap of green floral fits perfectly the murderous backstory of the cunning aristocratic woman imagined by Penhaligon's. Unfortunately, the clean, almost innocent dry down, as pleasant as it is, didn't live up to the PR story, as if the revenge was only an intention, but never made its way to the eventual execution of the plan.<br />
<br />
If you happen to be looking for a clean, modern, elegant green floral/white musk fragrance, I think The Revenge of Lady Blanche worths a try. But I would also suggest trying a few others in the same genre, as I do believe that there are other more sophisticated options at a more reasonable price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="765638"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=765638#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent739406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc739406" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jasminalia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/125784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jasminalia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma739406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd739406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/125784">Jasminalia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-09-05">09/05/16 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A scent by Issey Miyake is back. <br />
Its new name is The Revenge Of Lady Blanche ;-)<br />
Same perfumer, by the way!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="739406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=739406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1419959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1419959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellsGood123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellsGood123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pinrose/Pillowtalk-Poet-29565.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29565.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pillowtalk Poet"title="Pillowtalk Poet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1419959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1419959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256450">SmellsGood123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-30">09/30/21 20:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is seriously one of my absolute favorite fragrances and I've only had it for 48 hours. This is completely unlike ANYTHING I own and it is breathtaking. It is so fresh and clean while simultaneously woody and dark. Complicated and ever changing it does not disappoint. When I sprayed it onto my wrist I first smelled greenery, fresh and damp; lovely. Then after maybe 10 minutes it had morphed into something dark and mysterious. Its woody and earthy notes drew me in closer and with every inhale my eyes would roll back. The warmth of every exhale brought this to life little by little until now, when compared to the opening, it is completely unrecognizable and undeniably seductive. Dangerously addictive and ever so entrancing. This is a gem and should definitely be experienced. If this is Lady Blanche's revenge then her love would be the death of me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1419959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1419959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1375098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1375098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Advaitaforever"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224809.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Advaitaforever" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Essence-Rare-51691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essence Rare"title="Essence Rare"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1375098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1375098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224809">Advaitaforever</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-13">07/13/21 04:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very interesting fragrance. It opens with a sharp, bitter and biting green note reminiscent of the name and an obscure intention. As the fragrance dries down, the sweet, beautiful powdery and vulnerable floral notes emerge and conceal the bitter greenness, though it still remains throughout the duration. A very fresh, innocent and feminine scent character with a youthful and dewy texture that almost overshadows the thorny opening. Such a cool concept!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1375098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1375098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1291454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1291454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emerson10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emerson10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/ALTAIA/Don-t-Cry-For-Me-32343.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32343.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Don't Cry For Me"title="Don't Cry For Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1291454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1291454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238550">emerson10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-12">02/12/21 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>~WHEN THEY GO LOW, WE GO [TO] HIGH [TEA].~<br />
<br />
To me, Lady Blanche is a mischievous aristocrat; poised and ladylike, can be cutting with but a smile on her face.<br />
<br />
This opens quite powdery, the orris really shining here, in a powdery way akin to baby oil (but of high quality), then dries down in a beautiful way. I find orris generally to feel warmer than iris, but this skews more cold like I'm more used to with iris. I'm not particularly into powdery scents, but this is one I do love. Pleasant throughout, and then the green really comes through in the dry down. Like a powdery bouquet of flowers.<br />
<br />
Very elegant. Very refined. Very high tea vibes.<br />
<br />
update: I found myself reaching for this today, and 2nd around, I found it much more approachable. It's such a lovely green floral. It felt less powdery and more green second time around. Fresh and green.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1291454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1291454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent819412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc819412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kingdom-Scotland/Metamorphic-53987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Metamorphic"title="Metamorphic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma819412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd819412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-04">05/04/17 08:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't find this similar to Chanel 19, other than the fact there's a distinct iris. It's cleaner and less complex than that, less earthy (no moss, leather or galbanum)it also has a slight sweetness, like Iris Prima but far more crisp, less sweet, powdery and soft.<br />
<br />
The hyacinth stands out for me - it's a very spring-like perfume, the narcissus isn't animalic or rich (as it is in Lumiere Noire for example). It's elegant, cool and I think more contemporary than vintage in style.<br />
<br />
The green-ness is quite naturalistic, very much like the scent of bluebells, not too 'bathroom soap' though since the iris adds its perfumy dry powderiness. <br />
<br />
I like it, I'd say the mood is slightly formal and definitely daytime in spring, similar to comments below I don't find it very vengeful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="819412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=819412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent953125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc953125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FatimaD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FatimaD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/The-Library-Collection-Opus-X-35679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Library Collection Opus X"title="The Library Collection Opus X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma953125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd953125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129872">FatimaD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-16">06/16/18 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried it once - didn’t like it <br />
Tried second time- didn’t like <br />
On the third try I fell in love. It’s so beautiful. It does have a spicy punch in the dry down. It really is narcotic, like someone said already. It’s feminine, but I can see a man wearing it too. <br />
I have several Penhaligon fragrances, and most of them are from portraits - tho one is on top of my P’s choice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="953125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=953125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="40715" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Snicole82"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/765170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.765170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Snicole82" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Unknown-Pleasures-17438.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17438.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unknown Pleasures"title="Unknown Pleasures"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); Very clean and generic scent. I didn’t get green from this. I got a very clean linens smell. Weak sillage and longevity. Wouldn’t purchase a full bottle unless I’m into really clean scents, which I’m not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="2281291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=2281291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; They probably have a lavender coloured hair.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40715"comment_id="1872583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html?ccid=1872583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;         </span>

            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">53.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Azzaro.html" class="en2inter">Azzaro</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">54.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Narciso-Rodriguez.html" class="en2inter">Narciso Rodriguez</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">55.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Frederic-Malle.html" class="en2inter">Frederic Malle</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">56.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montblanc.html" class="en2inter">Montblanc</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">57.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Le-Labo.html" class="en2inter">Le Labo</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    <script>

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
